<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 16"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Twinned Defense (Fighter)](/Feats.aspx?ID=4853) <actions string="Single Action" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Fighter" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=601" />
<trait label="Stance" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=152" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=216) pg. 150 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Archetypes** [Dual-Weapon Warrior](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=57) (Level 18), [Dual-Weapon Warrior](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=247) (Level 18)

**Prerequisites**
[Twin Parry](/Feats.aspx?ID=4796)

**Requirements**
You are wielding two melee weapons, one in each hand

</column>

---

You’re always ready to use your off-hand weapon to interfere with attacks against you. While you are in this stance, you constantly gain the benefits of the Twin Parry action.

requirement: You are wielding two melee weapons, one in each hand
